name: Detective Grimoire
storyline:
Briefing

P.D.P.D file 054

Victim: Hugh Everton

Crime: Murder

At 10:28 last night, a body was found at the local Fairground that operates just outside of town. The cleaner, one Jerry Spears, discovered the dead body of his former colleague inside the Hall of Mirrors.

All the evidence points towards murder. The clown, Charles Ringer, who works at the very same fairground, is the main suspect. He seems to have some less than favourable links with the victim.

If this grim case remains unsolved, the Fairground Manager, Mr Gary Coils has stated he will have to "permanently shut down operations."

Private Detective Grimoire has been called in to clear things up. We've got one evening to find the truth about what happened last night. If Grimoire can't solve this mystery, no one can.

The Beginning of the Case

Grimoire and Officer James are outside of Coils Co Fairground and Grimoire was briefed before starting the case. As Grimoire headed to the entrance, he found a little girl who is offering help to the detective on the case by giving Grimoire a map of the fairground.

He enter the fairground to find Charles Ringer, outside the fun house. He questioned the main suspect that Hugh Everton was neglecting the fun house which cause ire with older employees. During the case, he meet with the rest of the employees, Mandy Ferrier, Ricky Warrer, Pete Nubhat, Jerry Spears and Gary Coils.
